personalInfo.name: Althaf Hussain Syed
personalInfo.title: DevOps Engineer | Cloud & Infrastructure Specialist
personalInfo.summary: Certified DevOps Engineer with 3+ years of experience in cloud infrastructure, automation, and CI/CD pipeline engineering. Multi-cloud certified professional with expertise in AWS, GCP, Azure, and Oracle Cloud. Proven track record of reducing operational overhead by 40% and improving incident response time by 30%.
